name: TI_2_1_3_13_System_Maintenance_Events__Remote_Access_System_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.3.13 System Maintenance Events -Remote Access System Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track system maintenance events -remote access.
purpose: Capture system maintenance events -remote access, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.13#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of a system maintenance event with remote access.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.13#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.13#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.13#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.13#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.13#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.13#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
